unnormalised: Arre yaar, hea electricity bill-ancho kharch hadda bhair zata asa! Fattli pavtim, to Rs. 5500 aslo, ani hea pavtim, ₹6200! Mhaka dista mhazo fridge gupten Bitcoin mining korta mhonn. Mhaka dista soglle light bond korun divlleancher jieunk zai. Tem romantic zatlem, ani mhozo bill fokot Rs. 50 zatlo. Hmmm, voitucheaak Rs 100-ak uktem dhoruya, kamit kam fan suru dovrunk zai!
normalised: Arre yaar, hea currenta billachem tension vaddon gela! Fattlim mhoinea panch hazar panchshe rupiya dille, ani hea pavtim shaa hazar don she rupiya! Maka disonk lagla mhaje fridge-an Bitcoin mining cholta mhunn. Hanv sogle light bond korun candle light-ant jieunk chodd borem zatolem. Romance astolo, ani bill fokot pannaas rupiya yetolem. Hmmm, khorem mhunnlear, yek she rupiya zai mhunn dhoruya, kam se kam fan chalu dovorchem poddtolem!
text: Arre yaar, hea electricity bill-ancho kharch hadda bhair zata asa! Fattli pavtim, to Rs. 5500 aslo, ani hea pavtim, ₹6200! Mhaka dista mhazo fridge gupten Bitcoin mining korta mhonn. Mhaka dista soglle light bond korun divlleancher jieunk zai. Tem romantic zatlem, ani mhozo bill fokot Rs. 50 zatlo. Hmmm, voitucheaak Rs 100-ak uktem dhoruya, kamit kam fan suru dovrunk zai!
